page.title: 13STANMER FARM
page.content: {This farm has only a tiny bit of land in our Domesday area .The soil types are mainly chalky.On this bit of land there is a motor cross rally every year and there is the remains of an oil exploration well. { {The}land is mainly cultivated fields. They have permiment pastures and have 3 Sussex bulls and dairy cattle.{ Altogether the farm has 1000 acres of which it uses 500 acres for corn and 500 acres of grass land.The machinery they have are 8 tractors , 2 combines , 2 muck spreaders and 2 ploughs.They have 6 workers who work from 7.30am to 5.00pm and on busy days 7.30am to 9.00pm. Mr west enjoys his work a lot. { { {
